TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MetaModel extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示 ASP.NET 动态数据使用的一个或多个数据库。

span.span: Represents one or multiple databases that are used by ASP.NET Dynamic Data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类型可让你注册的动态数据 Web 应用程序的一个或多个数据上下文。The type lets you register one or multiple data contexts for a Dynamic Data Web application. 数据上下文是表示数据库连接的对象。A data context is an object that represents a database connection. 数据上下文都有一个数据模型表示为可通过该连接的数据库访问权。A data context has access to one data model which represents a database that is available through that connection. 数据模型是一个对象，表示作为 CLR 类型的数据库的数据实体。A data model is an object that represents a database's data entities as CLR types. 动态数据支持基于 LINQ to SQL 和 ADO.NET 实体框架数据模型。Dynamic Data supports data models based on LINQ to SQL and on the ADO.NET Entity Framework. 在 Visual Studio 中，你可以生成数据模型类型使用**LINQ to SQL 类**模板或**ADO.NET 实体数据模型**模板。In Visual Studio, you can generate data-model types by using the **LINQ to SQL Classes** template or the **ADO.NET Entity Data Model** template. 这些模板用于 LINQ to SQL 模型或 ADO.NET 实体数据模型设计器 （实体设计器） 的实体框架模型对象关系设计器 （O/R 设计器）。These templates use the Object Relational Designer (O/R Designer) for the LINQ to SQL model, or the ADO.NET Entity Data Model Designer (Entity Designer) for the Entity Framework model. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用类型在一个 ASP.NET Web 站点中使用自动基架时需执行以下任务：The following example shows how to use type to perform the following tasks in order to use automatic scaffolding in an ASP.NET Web site: - 获取默认数据上下文的数据模型。Get the data model for the default data context. - 获取指定的数据上下文的数据模型。Get the data model for a specified data context. - 计算路由路径 （确定 URL） 指定的表。Evaluate the routing path (determine the URL) for a specified table. 该示例由一个页并且该页的代码隐藏文件组成。The example consists of a page and its code-behind file. [!code-csharp[System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel/CS/PlaceHolder.cs#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel/CS/PathModel.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel/VB/PathModel.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel/VB/PlaceHolder.vb#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel/CS/PathModel.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel/VB/PathModel.aspx.vb#2)] 若要编译该示例，你需要以下各项：To compile the example, you need the following: - [!INCLUDE[vs_dev10_long](~/includes/vs-dev10-long-md.md)] 或 [!INCLUDE[vwd_exp_dev10_long](~/includes/vwd-exp-dev10-long-md.md)]。 or [!INCLUDE[vwd_exp_dev10_long](~/includes/vwd-exp-dev10-long-md.md)]. - 动态数据网站。A Dynamic Data Web site. 有关详细信息，请参阅[演练： 创建一个新动态数据网站使用基架](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1564aef2-9103-436a-9806-c8ad7abd616a)。For more information, see [Walkthrough: Creating a New Dynamic Data Web Site Using Scaffolding](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1564aef2-9103-436a-9806-c8ad7abd616a). 请参阅此功能的运行时代码示例：[运行](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=120736&sref=System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel)。See a run-time code example of this feature: [Run](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=120736&sref=System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel).

exception.span: 如果存在数据上下文注册错误，则可由任何方法引发。

span.span: Can be thrown by any method if there has been a data context registration error.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下调用构造函数中的`Application_Start`的 Global.asax 文件的方法。You typically call the constructor in the `Application_Start` method of the Global.asax file. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用构造函数来执行以下任务：The following example shows how to use the constructor to perform the following tasks: - 实例化类。Instantiate the class. - 初始化并注册实例。Initialize and register the instance. summary.span: 实例化 类的新实例。

span.span: Instantiates a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数确定是否当数据模型，以便可以使用检索它，全局注册方法。This constructor determines whether the data model is registered globally so that it can be retrieved using the method. 这样可以创建多个模型并避免类型冲突时使用相同的实体类型。It enables you to create multiple models and use the same entity types while avoiding type conflicts. 通常情况下调用构造函数中的`Application_Start`的 Global.asax 文件的方法。You typically call the constructor in the `Application_Start` method of the Global.asax file.

summary.span: 获取应用程序创建的数据模型的第一个实例。

span.span: Gets the first instance of a data model that is created by the application.
The data-model instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性提供一种简单的方法，以引用默认数据模型实例。This property provides a simple way to reference the default data-model instance. 如果应用程序使用多个模型，则必须提供您自己的方式来存储对其他数据模型的引用。If the application uses multiple models, you must provide your own way to store references to the additional data models. 若要查找特定的数据模型，请调用方法。To find a specific data model, call the method. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用中的属性方法以获取默认数据模型。The following example shows how to use the property in the method to get the default data model. 有关完整示例，请参阅类概述。For a complete example, see the class overview. span.span: The virtual path of the DynamicData folder.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性使你能够更改 DynamicData 文件夹的虚拟路径。This property enables you to change the virtual path of the DynamicData folder. 默认值为"~/DynamicData"。The default value is "~/DynamicData".

[运行](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=120736&sref=System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel&spage=GetTable.aspx)联机示例的此功能。[Run](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=120736&sref=System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel&spage=GetTable.aspx) an online example of this feature. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用重载方法，执行以下任务：The following example shows how to use the overloaded methods to perform the following tasks: - 获取指定表的对象。Get the object for the specified table. - 访问所包含的元数据信息对象。Access the metadata information that is contained by the object. 该示例由一个页并且该页的代码隐藏文件组成。The example consists of a page and its code-behind file. MemberSignature.Value: public static void ResetRegistrationException ();
.method public static hidebysig void ResetRegistrationException() cil managed
Public Shared Sub ResetRegistrationException ()
public: static void ResetRegistrationException();

summary.span: 重置可能发生的任何前一个上下文注册错误。

span.span: Resets any previous context registration error that might have occurred.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当数据上下文注册过程中发生错误时，缓存并上所有后续操作引发异常。When an error occurs during data-context registration, the exception is cached and thrown on all subsequent operations. 例如，如果在应用程序启动时出错，则它将引发对每个请求。For example, if an error occurs at application start, it is thrown on every request. 调用此方法可以清除该错误，并启用新的上下文注册要执行。Call this method to clear the error and to enable a new context registration to be performed.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection<System.Web.DynamicData.MetaTable> Tables { get; }
.property instance class System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1<class System.Web.DynamicData.MetaTable> Tables
Public ReadOnly Property Tables As ReadOnlyCollection(Of MetaTable)

public: property System::Collections::ObjectModel::ReadOnlyCollection<System::Web::DynamicData::MetaTable ^> ^ Tables { System::Collections::ObjectModel::ReadOnlyCollection<System::Web::DynamicData::MetaTable ^> ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取属于数据模型一部分的所有表的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of all the tables that are part of the data model.

value.span: 一个包含属于数据模型的表的集合。

span.span: A collection that contains the tables that belong to the data model.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该集合包含数据模型，其中包括不可见的表中的所有表 （不是动态数据基架的一部分）。The collection contains all the tables in the data model, which includes the tables that are not visible (are not part of Dynamic Data scaffolding). [运行](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=120736&sref=System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel&spage=TablesMenu.aspx)联机示例的此功能。[Run](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=120736&sref=System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel&spage=TablesMenu.aspx) an online example of this feature. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用和属性执行以下任务：The following example shows how to use the and properties to perform the following tasks: - 数据模型中获取所有表的集合并显示在`GridView`控件。Get a collection of all the tables in a data model and show them in a `GridView` control. - 数据模型中获取的可见的表集合并显示在`GridView`控件。Get a collection of the visible tables in a data model and show them in a `GridView` control. 该示例由一个页并且该页的代码隐藏文件组成。The example consists of a page and its code-behind file. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel/CS/TablesMenu.aspx#5)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel/VB/TablesMenu.aspx#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel/CS/TablesMenu.aspx.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel/VB/TablesMenu.aspx.vb#6)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法获取与指定的表相关联的元数据。This method gets the metadata that is associated with the specified table. 如果找不到表，此方法返回`false`。If the table is not found, this method returns `false`. 这不同于方法，如果找不到表，将引发异常。This differs from the method, which throws an exception if the table is not found.

summary.span: 获取数据模型中可见表的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of the visible tables in the data model.

value.span: 可见表是指启用了基架的表。

span.span: A visible table refers to a table that has scaffolding enabled.

value.span: 这意味着它是具有 List.aspx 页的表。

span.span: This means that it is a table for which a List.aspx page exists.
